page.title: 09OIL IN HIGH HURSTWOOD
page.content: There has been alarm in the South East corner of our block where, after long discussions, permission has been given by the County Environment Committee for an oil company to explore for oil and natural gas. The permission covers a period of two years and also provides for an access road. There is apparently a 50/50 chance of oil being discovered. Environmentalists are concerned about the appearance of the site and the possible traffic hazards during exploration although they are conscious of the country's need for more oil and gas. If oil is found there will obviously be a great deal of controversy on this subject. Round the clock drilling is expected to take between four and six weeks.
